author: Shane Brinkman-Davis Delamore, Imikimi LLC
description: Streamlined APIs for AWS SDK with Promises and Art.Foundation
name: art-aws

scripts.build:
rsync -av --include='*.js' --include='*.css' --exclude='*' ./source/ ./build/
coffee -m --output build --compile source &
COFFEE_PID=$!
caf -m -c source -o build --require coffee-script/register&
CAF_PID=$!
wait $COFFEE_PID || exit 1
wait $CAF_PID || exit 1
npm run nn
scripts.build-clean:
# BUILD CLEAN START
#   - building into: build-temp
#
rm -rf ./__build-old__
rsync -av --include='*.js' --include='*.css' --exclude='*' ./source/ ./build/
coffee -m --output build-temp --compile source &
COFFEE_PID=$!
caf -m -c source -o build-temp --require coffee-script/register&
CAF_PID=$!
wait $COFFEE_PID || exit 1
wait $CAF_PID || exit 1
npm run nn

nn build-temp/*

# BUILD CLEAN FINIALIZING
#  - replace old build in:   build
#  - with new build from:    build-temp
#
mv build __build-old__
mv build-temp build
rm -rf ./__build-old__
scripts.dynamodb-admin: DYNAMO_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8081 AWS_REGION=us-east-1 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=blah-dev AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=blahblah-dev dynamodb-admin -H localhost -p 8001
